title: Bill Bishop: "The Big Sort"
description: Even though he wrote this book 14 years ago, "The Big Sort: Why the Clustering of Like-Minded America is Tearing Us Apart" by Bill Bishop remains more relevant than ever. He joined Michael to talk about it. Original air date 28 February 2022. The book was published on 7 May 2008.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Bill Bishop)
